tasks.cache: deno cache src/**/* npm:husky npm:lint-staged jsr:@andyb/git-release
tasks.coverage: deno task clean && deno test --coverage && deno coverage --html && open coverage/html/index.html
tasks.init: deno task cache && deno run -A npm:husky
tasks.preflight: deno fmt --check && deno lint && deno task typecheck && deno test --coverage && deno coverage
tasks.release: deno task preflight && deno run -A jsr:@andyb/git-release
